what: Calculate mean abundance of species — mean_abundance
title: Calculate mean abundance of species — mean_abundance
text: function calculates mean abundance species across hosts.

title: Calculate mean abundance of species — mean_abundance
Calculate mean abundance of species — mean_abundance
text: data data frame columns hosts (column 1) species (columns 3 onwards).

title: Calculate mean abundance of species — mean_abundance
text: data frame columns host, species, mean, sd, se.

title: Calculate mean abundance of species — mean_abundance
code: data <- data.frame(   host = c("A", "A", "A", "B", "B", "B"),   species1 = c(1, 5, 3, 2, 4, 0),   species2 = c(3, 2, 0, 1, 0, 0) )  mean_abundance(data) #> # A tibble: 4 × 5 #> # Groups:   host [2] #>   host  name      mean    sd    se #>   <chr> <chr>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1 A     species1 3     2     1.15  #> 2 A     species2 1.67  1.53  0.882 #> 3 B     species1 2     2     1.15  #> 4 B     species2 0.333 0.577 0.333

title: Calculate the mean intensity for each host — mean_intensity
Calculate the mean intensity for each host — mean_intensity
code: data <- data.frame(host = c(1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3),                    A = c(2, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0),                    B = c(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)) mean_intensity(data) #> # A tibble: 2 × 5 #> # Groups:   host [2] #>    host name   mean    sd    se #>   <dbl> <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1     1 A         2    NA    NA #> 2     3 A         1    NA    NA

Calculate the prevalence of parasitism — prevalence
Calculate the prevalence of parasitism — prevalence
text: data data frame individual hosts first column parasite counts remaining columns

title: Calculate the prevalence of parasitism — prevalence
text: data frame host first column prevalence second

title: Calculate the prevalence of parasitism — prevalence
code: data <- data.frame(host = c("A", "A", "B", "B"),                    parasite1 = c(1, 0, 0, 1),                    parasite2 = c(0, 1, 0, 0)) prevalence(data) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   host  prevalence #>   <chr>      <dbl> #> 1 A            1   #> 2 B            0.5 #>   host n_parasited n_host prevalence #> 1    A            2      2        1.0 #> 2    B            1      2        0.5
